org.apache.flink.runtime.instance

Interface InstanceListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultScheduler

    public interface InstanceListener
    Classes implementing the InstanceListener interface can be notified about the availability or the unexpected failure of an instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void allocatedResourcesDied(JobID jobID, List<AllocatedResource> allocatedResource)
      Called if one or more allocated resources assigned to at least one job have died unexpectedly.
      void resourcesAllocated(JobID jobID, List<AllocatedResource> allocatedResources)
      Called if one or more requested resources have become available.

    • Method Detail

      • resourcesAllocated

        void resourcesAllocated(JobID jobID,
                        List<AllocatedResource> allocatedResources)
        Called if one or more requested resources have become available.
        Parameters:
        jobID - the ID of the job the initial request has been triggered for
        allocatedResources - the resources which have been allocated as a response to the initial request

      • allocatedResourcesDied

        void allocatedResourcesDied(JobID jobID,
                            List<AllocatedResource> allocatedResource)
        Called if one or more allocated resources assigned to at least one job have died unexpectedly.
        Parameters:
        jobID - the ID of the job the instance is used for
        allocatedResource - the allocated resources which are affected by the instance death
